lead_paragraph: The United Nations has asked for an investigation into new accusations that United Nations peacekeepers sexually abused four underage girls in Bangui, the capital of the Central African Republic.

headline.print_headline: Africa; Central African Republic: U.N. Requests Inquiry Into New Sex Abuse Allegations Against Peacekeepers
headline.main: Central African Republic: U.N. Requests Inquiry Into Peacekeepers

snippet: The United Nations has asked for an investigation into new accusations that United Nations peacekeepers sexually abused four underage girls in Bangui, the capital of the Central African Republic.
abstract: United Nations requests inquiry into new accusation that its peacekeepers sexually abused four underage girls in Central African Republic.
